1.event_info: Internal trigger after observing the public map; prompts the miner to compute an action bundle for the round.

fields.name: round_index
fields.description: Index of the current round.

2.event_info: Action bundle submission including claims, raids, defense commitments, mining allocations, and optional priority orders.

fields.name: round_index
fields.description: Round for which the bundle applies.

fields.name: claims
fields.description: List of coordinates the miner attempts to claim.

fields.name: raids
fields.description: List of coordinates the miner attempts to raid from other owners.

fields.name: defend
fields.description: Defense commitments on currently owned plots with optional 0/1 commit values.

fields.name: mining
fields.description: Mining allocations expressed as per-plot stamina investments.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Optional priority metadata for deterministic clipping across categories and within-category order.

3.event_info: Environment summary describing executed actions, stamina usage, mining output, and ownership changes for the miner.

fields.name: round_index
fields.description: Index of the resolved round.

fields.name: stamina_budget
fields.description: Per-round stamina budget used for context.

fields.name: stamina_spent
fields.description: Stamina actually spent after clipping.

fields.name: stamina_submitted
fields.description: Stamina implied by the submitted bundle before clipping.

fields.name: gold_mined
fields.description: Gold mined by the agent this round.

fields.name: cumulative_gold
fields.description: Cumulative gold mined up to this round.

fields.name: executed_plan
fields.description: Final executed plan after legality screening and clipping.

fields.name: invalid_actions
fields.description: Actions removed during legality checks along with reasons.

fields.name: clipped_actions
fields.description: Actions or stamina removed due to exceeding the budget.

fields.name: stamina_breakdown
fields.description: Category-level stamina usage including planned and actual mining spend.

fields.name: plots_owned_after
fields.description: List of plots owned by the miner after resolution.

fields.name: plots_owned_after_count
fields.description: Number of plots owned after resolution.

fields.name: plots_owned_before
fields.description: List of plots owned before the round resolved.

fields.name: plots_owned_before_count
fields.description: Number of plots owned before the round resolved.

fields.name: plots_gained
fields.description: Plots acquired this round.

fields.name: plots_lost
fields.description: Plots lost this round.

fields.name: land_summary
fields.description: Aggregated land counts before and after resolution including gains and losses.

fields.name: mining_results
fields.description: Per-plot mining outputs for the miner.

fields.name: ownership_after
fields.description: Grid ownership map after resolution.

fields.name: public_log_entry
fields.description: Per-plot log published for this round.

-1.event_info: Initial trigger delivering the public map, last round log, stamina budget, and mining cap to each miner.
